introText: The Ministry of Citizenship and Multiculturalism promotes inclusion, diversity, and civic engagement, supporting Ontario's multicultural communities and combating racism and discrimination.
descriptionText: The Ontario Ministry of Citizenship and Multiculturalism spent $82M in fiscal year (FY) 2023-24, representing 0.0% of the $206.6B in total provincial spending. This investment supports diversity and inclusion initiatives.
roleText: Ontario's diversity is one of its greatest strengths. This ministry promotes inclusion, supports multicultural communities, combats racism, and works to ensure all Ontarians can participate fully in society.
programsDescription: The Ministry of Citizenship and Multiculturalism operates programs including anti-racism initiatives, youth engagement, heritage preservation, community grants, and civic participation support.
